modName: Nord Steel Plate with Fur and Chainmail - High Res
summary:
This\'s my version of the Nordic Platemail - 2048x2048 high resolution texture- UPDATED 7th January 2012 - Now with FEMALE version!

Two versions to choose from, Brown fur, Grey fur - New Fur texture changed from 1.0 to 1.1
descriptionHtml:
[color=lime]WezEllison\'s High Resolution Nord Steel Plate[/color]

[color=orange]Modders make these to make the game more enjoyable for you, All I ask for is some amount of feedback and if you like what you see please Endorse to show your appreciation, thankyou.[/color]


[color=lime]Why have you done this?[/color]
I generally wanted my own version of the nord steel plate and just had a play about with it & came up with this, as you can see there\'s a wolf head on the buckle - I\'m not sure if that\'s an appropriate type of symbol for a nord armour, but I think it looks smart. 

There is two main files one with brown fur and the other grey fur it\'s listed in the description of the file so you can\'t get mixed up. It\'s entirely up to you which one you choose. (see images) they both have female versions as of 1.1

[color=red]The picture that has the female with her arms crossed over are NOT before and after pictures - they\'re the two versions you can choose from, the brown fur or the grey fur version - They are both exactly the same other than the colour of the fur.[/color]

[color=orange]I will give kudos to people who upload pics & action shots of the armour in-game.[/color]

Male version [color=lime]100%[/color] Completed
Female version [color=lime]100%[/color] Completed
Resolutions come in 2048x2048 until a 1024x1024 is requested
New Normal Maps 

[color=lime]INSTALLATION[/color]
Extract contents into your Skyrim directory, If you\'ve got previous versions click yes to overwrite.

[color=Red]INCOMPATABILITIES[/color]
Any other file that modifies the textures or normals I do.
author: WezEllison
